Join the fight!
  

Dear ACLU Supporter,

Read all about it! As reported in the Huntington Herald Dispatch, the Vote No on Amendment 1 Coalition has made its public debut! We are hard at work with our partners to ensure that the reproductive rights of West Virginians are safe.

The Vote No on Amendment 1 Coalition is an extraordinary group of organizations that believe a woman should make her own decisions about her pregnancy and family and that people in our state should have access to health care. Period.

This ballot fight is historic and unprecedented in our state.

We and our partner organizations in this coalition have been fighting for women and families for decades. We represent West Virginians who are already struggling to make ends meet. We have come together to defend our health and families to defeat amendment 1 on behalf of the West Virginians we advocate for every day.

Together we can defeat this! Interested in doing more? Host a house party, help us table at events, or join the canvassing effort! Visit the Vote No on Amendment 1 Coalition website to learn more! (By clicking this link, you will be taken to an external site.)

Onward together,

ACLU of West Virginia
